name: Orbit Cannon
description:
Controls:
Space to launch,
RF to aim the cannon up or down,
TG to move the cannon left or right,
and WASD to move the ball

Destroy as much grey blocks as possible within 60 seconds to earn a highscore

Created for the 172nd Weekly Game Jam with the theme : "Catapult"

Terribly sorry for the buggy camera since it's my first 3D game
